lead_paragraph: BIALER--Stewart Sidney, died on November 27 following a battle with melanoma. He was 72. Stewart was born in Brooklyn, NY, to Lena and Solomon Bialer. He impacted countless lives as a passionate teacher in New York City's public schools. He gave generously, sharing his wisdom, compassion, time, home, heart, harvest and money-always seeking lives to enrich and the ways in which he could help. He is survived by his wife Susan BeGasse; children Emily and Lisa; sons-in-law Jordan and Jerry; and grandchildren Ori, Alyssa, Aaron, Julia, Jacob and Laila. Stewart's son, Adam, died suddenly two weeks following his death. 1/3
